mapper.insert: insert into member_term_my (num, id, insname, insnum, remainpay,paidprem, prem,contstat,inssort, death_ins) values (term_my_seq.NEXTVAL, #{0},#{1},#{2},#{3},#{4},to_number(#{5},'999999'),#{6},'term', #{7})
insert into member_prop_my (num, id, insname, insnum, remainpay, paidprem,prem,contstat,inssort) values (prop_my_seq.NEXTVAL, #{0},#{1},#{2},#{3},#{4},to_number(#{5}),#{6},'prop')
